hotels.vendor_name: Grand Hyatt Sanya Haitang Bay Resort and Spa
hotels.title: Beachfront Stay in ‘The Hawaii of China’ with Spa, Five Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Laze on the tropical beachfront of China’s spectacular Hainan Island at this five-star resort. Sanya has been named ‘the Hawaii of China’ and you’ll soon understand why, with pristine white-sand beaches and endless island ambience. Start your day with a refreshing dip in the infinity pool, overlooking the South China Sea, or indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at the world-class Huan Spa. Explore the local area and discover the vibrant culture and history of Sanya. Later, dine at one of the resort's numerous restaurants, offering a range of international and local cuisine, or sip on a cocktail at the chic poolside bar.
